content: *www.citizenorange.com/orange/2009/03/today-is-the-day-put-the-act-i.html (A pro-illegal alien site) More Amnesty stuff. The jist here is that illegals get discounted tuition. they will get the In-State rate, while a US citizen from another State would have to pay the huge expensive Out-of-State Rate. We are offering In-State to people from Out-of-Country-and Illegally-In. And you know who makes up the difference in cost.....ding ding ding! You got it, tax payers. They also push American students out of seats. See how organized and set up these people are to get stuff like this passed in DC? They all know about it....Did you? In my mind this is even better then we get as Vets. Look what we have to do to earn college money. (Not that I would trade my Military Life for anything, glad to serve.) Man, DC might as well hand over the keys and turn off the lights.

content: the argument that I have been hearing is the kids of illegals have lived here most, if not all their lives, and know nothing else except living in America.. and it is better to allow them in-state tuition for college then to have them kept in lower paying lifestyles. I can see some credence to this argument. Also I hear they cannot get any federal assistance, that is a good thing. In a way I agree there is no sense in shooting the kid for the fault of thier parents. One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE
